articles.title: Joe Biden administration settles for automatic job authorisation for spouses of H-1B visa holders - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The settlement in this regard was reached by the Department of Homeland Security in a class-action lawsuit, which was filed by the American Immigration Lawyers Association (AILA) on behalf of immigrant spouses this summer.

articles.title: US taking 'big bet' on Australia and nuclear submarines - 9News
articles.description: The sharing of sensitive American nuclear submarine technology with Australia is a signal that Washington is prepared to back its allies, a top US official says.

articles.title: Defense rests its case at murder trial of Kyle Rittenhouse - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: The defense rested its case Thursday at the murder trial of Kyle Rittenhouse, setting the stage for closing arguments Monday in the shootings that left Americans divided over whether he was a patriot taking a stand against lawlessness or a vigilante.
